content.html: And the action I'd encourage you all from #AWSSummit to take is to tell your account rep if you agree that AWS should recognize labor rights and stop selling to oppressive governments. They say they're customer obsessed and listen to feedback, so give them that feedback. I have.
content.value: And the action I'd encourage you all from #AWSSummit to take is to tell your account rep if you agree that AWS should recognize labor rights and stop selling to oppressive governments. They say they're customer obsessed and listen to feedback, so give them that feedback. I have.
